scripts.build: rimraf dist/*;cp src/downloadjs/download.min.js dist/; cp src/file-saver/dist/FileSaver.min.js* dist/;node --unhandled-rejections=strict minify.js;yarn corsget
scripts.install_modules: git submodule add  https://github.com/rndme/download src/downloadjs;git submodule add https://github.com/eligrey/FileSaver.js src/file-saver;
